text: Good evening
Hello
We are seeking donations for the "Save the Children" foundation
That sounds great. What are you looking to fund?
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
That is a very noble set of tasks
We are seeking a minimum of $.01 and a maximum of $2.00, your donation would serve childrena round the world
That's great. Unfortunately, I cannot afford to donate
Save the Children uses all their donations to help ensuring children's rights to health, education, safety
Are there any specific programs that you can tell me about?

A portion of doantions got to Syria, millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence
Im glad to hear that you are helping Syrian children, who suffer through very much
From the smallest donation will go a long way, as seen on the website  URL
I wish I could donate but I do not have enough money
Even a $0.25 will be a huge contribution, and help children around the world
Sadly I am unable to afford this
Any money donations can be used in more meaningful ways. Small donations will indeed help a lot of children and their families. You will be part of a solution around the world.
Im glad you told me about the work you do. When I have a job again, I will revisit the idea of donating.
Even as little as  a $0.10 donation will contribute to the cause
I understand, and I appreciate the work  you do. But at this time I cannot make a donation to you.
